Text.val: 06.03.2014 GB SCR18762 Added 3.1 Number of advances, 3.2 Total amount
13.03.2013 JH SCR17995 Replaced screen button load logic by GB901
05.07.2012 GB SCR17400 Changed condition for calculate the Errors
29.03.2012 SH SCR17182 Replaced GM900 by GB900 (program permission)
17.11.2010 GB SCR15992 Changed condition of selection
26.10.2010 GB SCR15911 Changed the order by
22.10.2010 GB SCR15900 Added action next funding request

SQL_STMT_U.val: select a.SFEX_FUNDINGREQUESTNUMBER, a.SFEX_SUPPLIERID, (select max(DEBH_HADR_NAME1) from :1/DEBH, :1/DEBC, :1/SFEX where DEBH_NO = DEBC_DEBH and DEBC_NO = SFEX_DEBC_NO and SFEX_FUNDINGREQUESTNUMBER = a.SFEX_FUNDINGREQUESTNUMBER and SFEX_SUPPLIERID = a.SFEX_SUPPLIERID), a.SFEX_CURRENCY, (select cast (sum (SFEX_CERTIFIEDAMOUNT - SFEX_DISCOUNTAMOUNT) as decimal (13,2)) from :1/SFEX where SFEX_SCFH_NO = :2 and SFEX_ADMNO = :3 and SFEX_CLNTNO = :4 and SFEX_REQUESTEDFINANCEC > 0 and SFEX_FUNDINGREQUESTNUMBER = a.SFEX_FUNDINGREQUESTNUMBER and SFEX_SUPPLIERID = a.SFEX_SUPPLIERID), (select count(*) from :1/SFEX, :1/SFER where SFER_SFEX_NO = SFEX_NO and SFEX_SCFH_NO = :2 and SFEX_ADMNO = :3 and SFEX_CLNTNO = :4 and SFEX_REQUESTEDFINANCEC > 0 and SFEX_FUNDINGREQUESTNUMBER = a.SFEX_FUNDINGREQUESTNUMBER and SFEX_SUPPLIERID = a.SFEX_SUPPLIERID and SFER_ERRORCODE > 0), (select max(SFER_HANDLED_USRID1) from :1/SFER, :1/SFEX where SFER_SFEX_NO = SFEX_NO and SFEX_SCFH_NO = :2 and SFEX_FUNDINGREQUESTNUMBER = a.SFEX_FUNDINGREQUESTNUMBER), (select max(SFER_HANDLED_USRID2) from :1/SFER, :1/SFEX where SFER_SFEX_NO = SFEX_NO and SFEX_SCFH_NO = :2 and SFEX_FUNDINGREQUESTNUMBER = a.SFEX_FUNDINGREQUESTNUMBER) from :1/SFEX a where a.SFEX_SCFH_NO = :2 and a.SFEX_ADMNO = :3 and a.SFEX_CLNTNO = :4 and a.SFEX_REQUESTEDFINANCEC > 0 group by a.SFEX_SUPPLIERID, a.SFEX_FUNDINGREQUESTNUMBER, a.SFEX_CURRENCY order by a.SFEX_SUPPLIERID, a.SFEX_FUNDINGREQUESTNUMBER
select cast (sum (SFEX_REQUESTEDFINANCEC) as decimal (13,2)), count(*) from :1/SFEX where SFEX_SCFH_NO = :2 and SFEX_ADMNO = :3 and SFEX_CLNTNO = :4 and SFEX_REQUESTEDFINANCEC > 0
